original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, users as u, badges as b WHERE b.UserId = u.Id AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-27 18:08:19' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 08:22:43' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.PostTypeId=2
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 18:08:19' AND CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 08:22:43'
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1.UserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E4.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 2
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E4E3.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
